work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Software developer in a somewhat large project. First actual experience from React. Noteworthy tasks are upgrading React version for the aforementioned project and migrating staging and production environments to AWS.

work.title: Project Worker
work.description: I completed my non-military service at JAMK University of Applied Sciences. My work consisted of studying Docker, Google Cloud and DevOps tools. During the summer I was a part of WIMMA Lab as a mentor.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: After my graduation from JAMK University of Applied Sciences in December 2017 I continued to work at Protacon Solutions Oy as a software developer.

work.title: Thesis Worker
work.description: I worked on my Bachelor's Degree thesis at Protacon Solutions Oy during the end of my apprenticeship. The thesis was written based on a client project I was a part of.

work.title: Junior Software Developer
work.description: As a Software Developer Trainee at Protacon Solutions Oy I worked in various client project using technologies such as PHP, Symfony, AngularJS, Angular and TypeScript. Agile software developments methods Scrum and Kanban were a great part during my trainee period.

work.title: Junior Software Developer
work.description: Challenge Factory was a part of DIMECC Need of Speed program, which focuses on building a foundation for the success of Finnish software companies. During my time at Challenge Factory, I worked as a junior software developer as a part of a team that developed a proof-of-concept of sewer measurement system to monitor water level and flow etc. The work involved technologies and techniques such as Scrum, Java, Kaa, Git, Python, Cassandra and Raspberry Pi.

work.title: Web Developer Trainee
work.description: At Nitroid I worked as a web developer trainee. I did front-end development for various clients using technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, PHP, Drupal and Joomla.

work.title: Summer Trainee
work.description: I continued my previous web development work at Taipalsaari municipality during summer. This work involved technologies such as HTML5, CSS3 and Drupal. On the side, I did workstation installations and updates.

work.title: Web Developer Trainee
work.description: At Taipalsaari municipality I worked as a web developer trainee developing their new website. This work involved technologies such as HTML5, CSS3 and Drupal.

education.title: Bachelor"s Degree in Software Engineering
education.description: Studies focused on software development and consisted of basics of multiple programming languages, scientific subjects, project works and basics of 3D modeling.

education.title: Vocational Qualification in Information and Communications Technology
education.description: Studies focused on software development and consisted of web development, graphic design, databases and customer service.

education.title: Finnish Matriculation Examination
education.description: I completed matriculation examination with mathematics, English, Swedish and Finnish as subjects.
